replies.body: Why weren't these changes all in preseason so that they could be practiced and applicable when the season actually began?
This should be the top comment holy moly
over the past season and a half riot is slowly making it suck worse and worse to be a jungler. thanks riot....thanks alot
These jungler changes are actually much more potent than people realize. Expect the average jungler to be down 2-3 levels from a solo laner at all times.

It fucking sucks. It would be better if they nerfed gold and xp AND decreased camp respawn time, rewarding junglers for actually pathing and farming well. All this will do is make the jungle even more PVP oriented. Get ready for S9 jungle meta where sit in a lane for the entire game.
I proposed that in one of my earlier posts, but it got no attention. If you want to keep junglers in the jungle, make them have to farm if they want to stay competitive.

Less so that, but more give them an objectively even option.
They removed a choice in dragon (as it's too strong to solo for many champs who either lack DPS (jg assassins), clear it too slow (tanks) or lack in combat sustain).
They remove the jungle farm by crushing respawn times and making most of them worth diddly squat. They used to be fatter, respawn more frequently but worth more (2 buffs for lvl 3). 
And they heavily nerfed the vision game (used to be able to have 3-5 wards on you, or pre vision changes as many wards as you wanted). Meanwhile a jg fruit can remove all your risky work with one click.

So now, we do one thing. We gank, gank and gank some more
There's something wrong with it?

Yes and no. Yes because junglers that would prefer not to gank early and instead want to farm more will suffer more than junglers who want to gank at level 2. Level 2 ganking will be unaffected since scaling nerfs don't really start until level 3. Keep in mind there is no catch-up experience anymore from jungle camps. Now that scaling only occurs once every other level AND that scaling value is down by about half from previous scaling, you are looking at a very significant decrease in jungle experience, much of which will be made up for in lane by succeeding in a gank and killing the target. Power farmers can't make up that loss and will lose to ganking junglers every time.

No because jungler presence is really high, but I'm not convinced this will solve anything other than further shrink the pool of viable junglers.

You know how early game junglers can spam gank with little incentive to farm and manage to be 3 levels above the enemy jungler because they gain lane priority for every free scuttle and the enemy jungler can't do anything about it making the opposing jungler just undealable?

That just became worse because now the behind jungler will have a harder time coming back, and the winning jungler has LESS incentive to go farm minimum wage XP when they can just win ganking and shoving lanes sapping XP instead.  

The reason early game junglers spam gank isn't because they have the XP to get away with it, its because they don't need the XP as much as other junglers who have to scale into the game, which indirectly, buffs early game and nerfs anything that needs to scale and makes the behind jungler get snowballed even worse.

cant wait for the solo laners to endlessly invade and contest my camps and scuddles when I'm 2 levels down and only making it worse for me. its already hard to recover, and normally by that point laners are taking Camps as well...
So sad because junglers already have a hard time keeping up with laners in experience and cs

As a new jungler (silver 4) this is just going to be a pain. I'm usually a level or two behind the solo laners most games and this is going to make that even worse. The literal one upside is maybe now my laners won't kill my mobs when they hit 6.

No, your teammates will still counterjungle you because they'll see you as even more useless now.  Get ready for ADC always taking your krugs (blue side), midlane always taking your raptors, support always taking your blue (red side), and being constantly flamed by everyone for stealing XP in lane and taxing their waves and dying when you attempt to gank laners 3 levels above you.
Season and a half? It's been a bi yearly tradition for years for riot to change everything up in the jungle.
The kayn passive change is something Ive longed for {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Pls stop hurting my Rakan, he already gets popped :(
Being fast is what made Rakan fun and good. If he's slow then he's WORTHLESS
just played a game with Rakan and he feels useless in laneing phase
AGREED!!! I LOVE RAKAN MY MAIN HOE!!
nerfing tahm kench when he's at a 44% winrate
While I think Tahm Kench is literal garbage right now, this 'nerf' isn't doing anything to mainstream play.
You're right, but it still feels like Riot's spitting in the eye of anyone who wants to play Tahm Kench.
Absolutely. I'm sick of this professional favoritism that is utterly and completely destroying that champion for anything but a niche pick.
Being able to take his r during combat was one of the best parts about him too. They could've just let it be, and no one would have an issue with it. Feels Sad.

So even {{champion:429}} got a buff last patch.
What about {{champion:268}} ?
{{champion:268}} is barely playable now with his 44%WR. To be honest Bot lane Azir works even better than mid Azir cuz at least you can have a safe farming phrase early game.

I don't really see that as the case. Azir has a 44% winrate because he's actually hard to play. I've gone against Azir's who completely fuck everything that comes into their W range, and I've seen Azirs miss their R on an afk target. When you actually learn Azir and learn the matchups, he's pretty damn good. He's just too high of a skill cap for most players.

Well Tahm Kench is in the same spot for the support role with 43% WR, and he's getting a skin this patch... Soooo they nerfed him. He's such a fun support. He doesn't deserve this weird, inverted logic.
As if the support role was not hated enough already, just gives people even more reason to be playing these champs in "support" {{champion:63}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:74}}

hes been getting this "weird, inverted logic" for like this entire season - every patch is either a nerf, them trying to forcefully ignore the pitiful state hes in, or a nerf not-so-disguised as a buff.
So is Lux's E SFX going to be fixed this patch? It's been slowly driving me crazy hearing it linger.
When can tank Galio get buffs? {{sticker:galio-happy}}
You know that Galio got removed from the game a while back, right?

Pre rework Galio wasn't even really a tank. His shield was anti-dot and that was it really. His other two basic abilities were fully damage. Sure his passive gave him damage for mr but back then the selection for mr items was pretty small. You had banshees, visage, and abyssal and that was basically it. Sure if the enemy team was full of ap/magic damage you could be a tank but with a few ads you really didn't want to.

You forgot his first build item {{item:3174}} until Rito Game thought it was a good idea to remove it from the game. Sure his shield was very good against dots but it was still good on it's own. What kind of shield gives you 70 armor and mr while healing you every time you take a hit, that was a flat heal you know. As for his mr, 50% of his mr went to his AP. I never did say Galio was a tank, he was an anti-mage mage. The only thing he was missing was some kind of dash and he was a broken champ. Also don't you dare call that smug overdecorated walking rock Gailo.

Man I completely forgot about when Athenes was a mid lane item. I still remember building it over morello despite it being what people insisted was the better item on mages before it was reworked into a support item. Guess I don't remember as much about old Galio as I thought I did. Completely forgot it gave that much for resistances while having the heal being flat. But I do remember that he was my go to pick whenever the enemy team picked Brand and walking into his skillshots just to heal up. I still remember hoping either that shield or his gust of wind would make it to the rework. And yeah the current champion with the name Galio really doesn't play like old Galio but old Galio and release rework Galio were never burst mages.

I miss counterpicking a Malz or Brand and maxing w first just to dominate lane.  That 70 mr is also 35 free AP, it's honestly a shame they reworked Galio completely.  If they just gave his kit some touchups and a new e he would've been fine.

I'd honestly love that. We already know that AP Galio is going to get nerfed into the ground in terms of damage, same with Sejuani. Riot takes away their tankier stats and utility, replaces it with way too much damage, then nerfs the damage, then wonders why the champion's win rate drops 10%.

Hey guys! I see you're buffing Shyvana through the Cinders debuff on her E, but that ability actually has a severe bug!

{{champion:102}} {{item:3751}} {{champion:102}} {{item:3751}} {{champion:102}} {{item:3751}} {{champion:102}} {{item:3751}} {{champion:102}}

When Shyvana applies the Cinders debuff in Human Form, her auto attacks deal percent health bonus damage, as expected. However, when Shyvana applies the Cinders debuff in Dragon Form, her auto attacks deal no extra damage--the debuff is merely cosmetic.

Not having access to Cinders' bonus damage during teamfights makes Shyvana a lot weaker in-game than she looks on paper, and as a result this buff probably won't help her as much as intended.
If this is true, provide evidence through screenshots and post it to Report a Bug.

You make it sound like riot actually cares about bug reports... looking at the gigantinormous morde and sion buglists that have received _lots of acknowledgement from rito totally_ despite being incredibly detailed with screenshots, clips from various sources (including proplay), and carefully tested reproduction instructions.
When are you going to fix the bug with the sound of Lux's E when detonating early
{{item:3455}} kha is broken nerf this champ
Nah, they just nerfed all junglers instead.

How about enough with those prestige skins? they make getting RP less appealing, and I for one refuse to spend my RP on them, regardless of how lovely they may be.

Other crazy ideas:

What about a fruit salad skin line? we have a pizza line, what about the salad lovers? 
Gragas can throw the whole bowl during his ult causing an explosion of veggies or fruits
Malz can have a fruit ult where he drinks juice through a straw from his target (a bit nasty but still humorous)
Cocnuts MF - I mean.... it's just kind of required...
Tahm Kench needs one for sure... not sure how to make it work though. 
Banana Chogath - he is a tree and the more stacks he has the more bananas he has hanging off! Q? BANANAS! W? BANANA JUICE! E? MORE BANANAS! R? it's bananas you said? ok! NOM NOM NOM!
I can go on, but it sounds like a fun 975 rp skin line, something we are missing lately.

Lux needs another voice. It wants me to kill someone when I hear her speak. And I play her from time to time so it happens.

Gnar buffs?

Syndra got smacked. Please revert her passive for Q or increase the duration based on ability level/champ level. She needs a quality of life buff because she is dead. It's rare to see a good Syndra player, and anyone below silver will have trouble playing her.

Ryze - please do not give up on him! I love playing him and I miss him. The feeling of content when the flux exploded on a large wave and just wipes it out.... wow.... you took away LB's rework based on community requests, however I for one loved playing her like that, so now I only have ryze. Please bring him back. If he sounds rude it's only because he is trying to save the world. He has amazing voice lines, and I would love to play him more. 


Last thing - Heim Dragon Trainer. Best skin ever. Thank you for making it. I love it and play him for the skin because it's so fun.

There is so much healing in the game...the only item a mage can get for grievous wounds is MORELLO. It is a must buy when every adc builds a blade of the ruined king or mundo, darius, fiora heals so much..if you wanted to nerf the magic pen then nerf the magic pen DONT nerf the AP, that just makes no sense when an ad champ can buy an executioners for 800 or a tank can buy a bramble vest for 900. If you dont want mages to buy morello then give us a cheaper option for grievous wounds.

I'd rather have the 10 AP nerf than losing any magic pen. 10 AP is negligible for any AP champ that has ratios below 100%, and even for AP champs with 100% ratios or more, that still means less than a 10 damage nerf due to magic resistance. Magic pen, on the other hand, has much more of an impact for **any** AP champ. 

Either way, it's just more of Riot's bias hatred towards AP.
So when does this go live, officially?
Tomorrow at 3am (PST), 4am (MST), 5am (CST), 6am (EST).
Shyvana is gonna be insane holy moly lol
